ComicInfo.Title: Toe Jam Comix; The Oasis; Bums and the Bird-Spirit; Hoo-Doo Storm; Oat Willie Mashes the Motor; Hard-Ass Friday Nite; My Troubles with Women; I Mock Verbatim; Captain Pissgums and his Pervert Pirates Sail Again!
ComicInfo.Summary: A "true confession" as Crumb talks about his checkered history with women, from early childhood to his jaded post-sixties flings.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:32:43. [CVDB185328] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:21:28. [Issue ID 202443]
